# Get Basic team data

```{r}
library(dplyr)
teamCode <- "mavericks"
teams_list %>% filter(TEAM_CODE == teamCode) %>% mutate_if(is.factor, as.character) -> basicTeamInfo; basicTeamInfo

```

# Get season Stats
```{r}
getTeamSeasonStats(parameters = list(TeamID = basicTeamInfo %>% select(TEAM_ID)))
```
